snippet.title: ITER | Announcement Trailer - IGN Gamescom Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
In this mining roguelite, you play as an loyal employee of the ITER Corporation, directed with the important mission of channeling power from the surface back to your underground civilisation. Board your trusty laser ship to mine for resources and harness the planet’s energy. Navigate through mysterious floating pillars and extract valuable items and resources, essential to your survival. Across multiple runs, you’ll uncover the secrets lurking on the surface and ultimately restore power to the Undercity. Use gathered resources and item upgrades to build your defences against waves of mechanoids and streamline resource extraction in the hopes of making it out alive - or at least leaving enough equipment for the next operative…

fluckyMachine: https://x.com/fluckyMachine
Fireshine Games: https://discord.gg/fireshinegames
